title: Caro Game
description: A simple Caro game built with Python and Pygame. This is the first project in my journey of studying at HCMUS.

title: Simple Proxy
description: This project is a cross-platform proxy server built with C/C++. It includes features such as domain and IP blocking and provides a graphical user interface for ease of management.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms Visualizer
description: This project is a visualization tool for common data structures and algorithms, built using C++ and the Raylib library. It allows users to interactively observe how data structures change step-by-step during fundamental operations like insertion, deletion, and search.

title: LEGv8 CPU Simulator
description: This project is A visual LEGv8 CPU simulator implemented in Java, designed for educational purposes to help understand the datapath and control signals of a simple pipelined processor. Users can write LEGv8 assembly, observe the step-by-step execution on a graphical datapath, and inspect register and memory states.

title: Terminal Portfolio
description: This is the portfolio you are using, built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to create an interactive command-line experience.

title: UDP Flooding
description: A simple UDP flooding tool built with C/C++.
